title: Terminator Future Shock Playthrough -- Part 3
description: The game is cool but it's very easy to get lost. I couldn't finish one of the levels for some reason. Hopefully by next part I'll figure it out.

or a great story or something

Apple provided OpenGL support by themselves. On Windows each hardware vendor implements support. Which is why AMD is lagging behind on Windows and Linux, but not on OSX
